website_summaries.verdict: Handle is slightly smaller than competitors, making it a good choice if others are too heavy and bulky for you.
pros: 16-foot retractable, reflective leash with quick lock design
Designed for dogs weighing up to 110 pounds
cons: Braking mechanism may fail over time
Those with larger hands find the handle a bit small

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: The price was right! I got this go replace my worn down one I had gotten at my local pet store. I didn't want to pay $30 for it so I went to Amazon. This quality is great and even includes a dog waste bag dispenser and roll if bags. An added bonus! I have a 120lb dog and it holds up for him. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Austin

customer_reviews.title: I retract my last review
customer_reviews.text: The ribbon got stuck about 5 ft. out I could not retract it or get any more out. Since the retraction part is critical to me as I use a power chair to walk my dog. The next day I had to walk my boy and just figured I would have a hard time walking and I was pissed. just as we started out I noticed the leash was working again! Also Petdom reached out to me he same day to resolve the issue. Sorry Petdom for the bad review, I take it back so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received it broken, sent a new one and it broke again from just attaching it to my dog's collar.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 pound teacup yorkie broke this leash just by attaching it to her collar and putting her on the ground. She did take even a step and the black rope/leash detached from the silver hook. All I did was connect the leash to my dog's collar, put her on the ground and it completely snapped off. I don't understand how they could even sell this. I complained to them and they sent me a new one. The same thing happened. So so so poorly made and cheap. SOO cheaply made. Please keep your pets safe and don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Mendez

customer_reviews.title: The bags included for dog poop were horrible! Leash was too thin and broke
customer_reviews.text: Originally I like this purchase but my neighbor walks my dog for me because I'm handicapped and I purchased this in July and this month February it broke the least part is very thin and even though my dog is only about 30 lb it just broke right off so now I have to find something else to buy that will hold up longer than this
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and is made of high quality material. We took it camping and the dog didn't drag me down the steps like she usually does. It gives the dog the freedom to find a place to go to the bathroom without you right behind the dog. I would highly recommend this product. The company also sent me a message a week after I bought it letting me know if there was any problems just let them know and they would take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this through prime and it came in 2 days. This is my first time getting a dog so I wasn't sure which leash to get. I really like the product I ordered. I have a 55 lb German Shepard Mix and so far the leash has been in tact. He tends to pull the leash alot but it hasn't broken yet. The doggy bag is a plus. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This product is not safe to walk your dog with if you are near a road at all. It’s too slow to lock in place. Good for a park perhaps but definitely not safe for a roadway of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Great leash for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great leash for a good price! Loved that it came with a bag dispenser! That was a really nice add-on. It’s very long and really solid so that’s great. The only complaint I had was that at first, the lock for the leash didn’t stay locked and would sometimes pop out of place, maybe because it’s a little loose. If you hold it down though, it works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer E.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it about two weeks. Great quality and great price. A little heavier than my other leashes but it gives me more comfortable feeling when I hold it. The leash lock button locks the leash very firmly. Very comfortable and easy to use. If I need another one, definitely I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Long and strong
customer_reviews.text: My 68lb bull dog hasn't broken it. That's saying a lot. Retracts completely still after several months so the spring isn't getting stretched out. Seems solid so far.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not very reliable
customer_reviews.text: it broke after 10 months use. My dog only weighs 30 lbs and the retractable option is opposite your natural inclination to push forward to stop the leash from expanding.
customer_reviews.author: rey diaz

customer_reviews.title: wells well
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the position of the lock button in that I have to readjust to reach it - but otherwise its nice
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Loving this leash!
customer_reviews.text: I love these leashes! I bought them for my dogs (15 lbs. and 25 lbs.) and they are excellent. The product has enough heft to feel like it's secure, without being so heavy that it's a pain to carry. The included waste bag dispenser is very convenient! I will definitely recommend these leashes to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash
customer_reviews.text: This leash is everything it says it is! We get many compliments from family that watch our dog, they love the leash!
customer_reviews.author: CBergs

customer_reviews.title: Product isn’t for our Golden Doodle
customer_reviews.text: Our dog grabbed ahold of the leash while we were sitting in the park. Chewed through it in about 15 seconds. It was about 2 weeks old.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon MO

customer_reviews.title: ... needed a new one and I will say I love it, especially because it came with the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this dog leash because I needed a new one and I will say I love it, especially because it came with the bag dispenser AND bags in it! The only thing I noticed is that the logo sticker was falling off when I opened the box, but no big deal. The leash works great and I like the design for holding it as well. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: branlf17

customer_reviews.title: Great leash
customer_reviews.text: Only problem with leash is you can’t hold button to temporarily change length. It has to be locked
customer_reviews.author: LLW

customer_reviews.title: perfect for larger dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a 100 pound blood hound and this leash works perfectly. I can comfortably let her extend the leash without the fear of her breaking the line!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer sokolowski

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium sized golden retriever. The leash broke with 2 months use. We only use this for potty breaks. She doesn't get walked with this leash. She is not a strong puller. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: Dog leash
customer_reviews.text: The retractable dog leash is working out for our dog Miss Bea. It is tangle free and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: dloyd

customer_reviews.title: It is very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these about 2 months ago. I used the daily for the since then. They no longer retract all the way. It doesn’t stay locked. One little tug and it slips preventing me from having control them. I am in the market for now ones for our safety.
customer_reviews.author: C H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Has good tension on the lead so the dog doesnt get tangled. Lock works well. Bag carried carries normal dog bags. Good price for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Weber

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this leash for my 40 lb golden doodle. The first time we used it the leash broke while on her collar. The hook came away from the leash which retracted into the plastic unit. Luckily this happened while we were in the car 7 not while walking! Amazon was good about letting us return it free of charge and refunding our money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash
customer_reviews.text: A really great leash, it’s strong and works well with our dog.
customer_reviews.author: pb1124

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sister to use. She likes it. It is easy to use and good size and design
customer_reviews.author: ksun

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great leash for my 20lbs mini Schnauzer who likes to pull.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kuczek

customer_reviews.title: 35 pound puppies will break the rope.
customer_reviews.text: On my second walk with my puppy he saw a squirrel and chased it. The line broke and I had to chase a hyper puppy as he ran through a busy street and lawns. Very scary thankfully a car stopped before hitting him and they got out and blocked the road until I got him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. It came on time and packaged well. It is a little heavier then my other retractable leash, but that is fine. I like the slide release button to keep the leash loose or locked in place.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dayon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable handle, smart construction!
customer_reviews.text: Handle is the most comfortable I’ve ever had before. Excellent product and very chic looking.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Glowa

customer_reviews.title: this does not retract!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this - it doesn't retract. Didn't work from the first day - if I take the time and work it I can get it to go back but always has about three feet that just won't go back. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: larry e. tindell

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism broke within a week. I can still use it the leash, but can’t lock it to a certain length.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Alls

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit my hand
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomicly uncomfortable My normal size hand can’t reach the release button. And it’s very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Leigh H.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month of use
customer_reviews.text: This leash was rated for a 110 pound dog... this leash could not survive my 35 pound Terrier/Sheppard mix. Definitely avoiding this brand moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cafferata

customer_reviews.title: Works well, so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems well made, not too heavy and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and design most of all. Also easy to use and the length is good for my dog. If you grip the handle you can feel comfortable,too.
customer_reviews.author: Elly K

customer_reviews.title: Not A leash for a dog-chewer
customer_reviews.text: Great leash however it is not dogs who like to chew on the leash. Our dog chewed through it in less than 5 min
customer_reviews.author: Ty Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy retractable leash.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small chihuahua and this leash can definetly can be for a larger dog also.
customer_reviews.author: evelinda

customer_reviews.title: Good Leash
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a sturdy leash for my dog although she is only 25 pounds. It’s also nice because it is longer than a lot of leashes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke after just 4 months or use. Seller has given a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin G.

customer_reviews.title: This leash twists itself and will not retract.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this leash and would like to send it back as it does not retract itself
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie B.

customer_reviews.title: fits in my hand well and its easy to operate the locking part
customer_reviews.text: My Dog King enjoys the freedom of that 16 feet. There is enough of a pull to keep him in line with out having to Lock it.
customer_reviews.author: Judah

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Does the job. No complaints! Seller was great too
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great leash
customer_reviews.text: Perfect leash for our puggle and it arrived super fast
customer_reviews.author: Erick Brekke

customer_reviews.title: Could Use A Better Lead Material.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it came with a poop bag holder and bags. It's a bit too heavy and the tape lead odds very flimsy. My puppy has chewed through it twice already. So it definitely isn't for using with a new puppy if you're planning on tying it out while you go into a store or use a bathroom. It'll chew through in a second and be gone.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Dawn Early

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have a 95 lb boxer who is built like a brick house. He's broke 2 collars and 3 leashes. This has held up for 5 months so far
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

product_meta.title: PETDOM Retractable Dog Leash Reflective Tape - 16ft Extendable Leash for Medium Large Breed - Heavy Duty Leashes for Outdoor Training (White)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
